goal.ch: The objective of this course is to help equip students with the basics regarding real estate finance and investments and related topics such as MBSs and REITs. In particular, students are encouraged to use a financial calculator (BAII plus of Texas Instrument preferable) in class and for doing exercises, as well as conduct a regression analysis by applying the hedonic pricing model and by employing real estate transaction prices provided by the Dept of Land Administration of Ministry of Interior.
goal.en: The objective of this course is to help equip students with the basics regarding real estate finance and investments and related topics such as MBSs and REITs. In particular, students are encouraged to use a financial calculator (BAII plus of Texas Instrument preferable) in class and for doing exercises, as well as conduct a regression analysis by applying the hedonic pricing model and by employing real estate transaction prices provided by the Dept of Land Administration of Ministry of Interior.

outline.ch: The theory and practice of real estate finance and investments with an emphasis on features of mortgage loans, property valuation (e.g., the hedonic pricing model), and various management issues facing MBSs (mortgage-backed securities) and REITs (real estate investment trusts). This course will also examine the use of the hedonic pricing model by employing the real estate transaction prices provided by the Dept of Land Administration of Ministry of Interior.
outline.en: The theory and practice of real estate finance and investments with an emphasis on features of mortgage loans, property valuation (e.g., the hedonic pricing model), and various management issues facing MBSs (mortgage-backed securities) and REITs (real estate investment trusts). This course will also examine the use of the hedonic pricing model by employing the real estate transaction prices provided by the Dept of Land Administration of Ministry of Interior.
